tags.description: Search and filter through our tags that represents the topics of your open problem, or create your own tag by pressing enter.

compounds.description: Search and select any compounds that are involved in your open problem using the name, CHEMBL id or PubChem id. Add a compound that is not in the list by by pressing enter.

species.description: Search and select any species involved in your open problem. Add a species that's not in the list by pressing enter.

genes.description: Search and select for any genes involved in your open problem using either the gene name or HGNC symbol. Add a gene that's not in the list by pressing enter.

sectionDescription: Tags and annotations you provide help us categories your open problem topic into our current compilation/
